sentences.en: Actually, the defeat also can embellish the life.
sentences.cn: 其实, 失败也能点缀人生.

sentences.en: But people do tend to embellish their avatars somewhat.
sentences.cn: 但人们的确倾向于修饰自己的头像.

sentences.en: Can you embellish your refusal just a little bit?
sentences.cn: 难道你就不会对你的婉拒之辞略加修饰 吗 ?

sentences.en: Embellish basic covers and curtains with borders, ties and fringing.
sentences.cn: 用镶边、系带和流苏装饰朴素的床罩和窗帘。

sentences.en: Have what clear larynx, the good method with embellish expectorant throat?
sentences.cn: 有什么清喉, 润嗓化痰的好方法?

sentences.en: I asked him not to embellish the truth with ideas of his own.
sentences.cn: 我要他不对事实添油加醋.

sentences.en: It caused him to seek to embellish his most incontestable achievements.
sentences.cn: 这使他想对自己最无可争议的成就加以吹嘘.

sentences.en: Ivy leaves embellish the front of the dresser.
sentences.cn: 梳妆台正面饰有常春藤叶子。

sentences.en: Just tell the truth and don't embellish the story by any means.
sentences.cn: 你只要讲清事实,千万不要添枝加叶.

sentences.en: She gave an embellished account of what had happened.
sentences.cn: 她添油加醋地把发生的事描述了一番。

sentences.en: The boat was embellished with carvings in red and blue.
This patent pending product is the modern way to embellish your commode.
sentences.cn: 这个正在申请专利的产品,是现代的方式,美化您的坐便器空间.

sentences.en: Various windows embellish the corridor, with the shape of square, circle, hexagon and octagon.
sentences.cn: 走廊的窗户形状各异，有方形，有圆形，有六角形，也有八角形。

sentences.en: We embellish our room with new rug, lamp, and picture.
sentences.cn: 我们以新地毯, 灯和图画布置我们的房间.

sentences.en: We embellish our room with new rugs, lamps, and pictures.
sentences.cn: 我们用新地毯, 灯和图画布置我们的房间.

sentences.en: What does the food with embellish aperient bowel have?
sentences.cn: 润肠通便的食物有哪些?

sentences.en: You embellish the autumn the brilliant multi - colors.
sentences.cn: 你把秋天点缀得绚烂多彩.

trans.tran_en: to make something more beautiful by adding decorations to it
to make something more beautiful by adding decorations to it
